name: Ghastly Grove
description: Alex has been walking around in these woods for hours now trying to find their flashlight. The light of the moon barely penetrates the fog as they search. The reason that Alex is in this situation in the first place is because of a story that Alex’s friends told them, one of a spectral being that haunts the area hunting those that get lost. Alex suddenly feels a chill as they turn and see the empty eyes of the spirit known as LARRY.
